message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $12,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but $12,000 is a bit steep for me. I'd be willing to pay $9,000 for it. Can you consider my offer?
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking for something closer to $11,000. Would you be willing to meet me somewhere in the middle?
I understand your position, Alice, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $9,500. Would you be willing to meet me at $9,500?
